How to Play:

You, Mike McDermott, face a heads-up match against Teddy KGB. A man with suspected Russian mob ties, Teddy has agreed to play for 3 stacks of high society, or $30,000 US dollars.
  1. 3X or 1/2 Pot (grey): Wager 3 times the big blind for the first bet/raise preflop. Wager 1/2 of the current pot.
  2. 4X or 2/3 Pot (grey): Wager 4 times the big blind for the first bet/raise preflop. Wager 2/3 of the current pot.
  3. 5X or Pot (grey): Wager 5 times the big blind for the first bet/raise preflop. Wager the current pot.
  4. All In (grey): Wager all of your chips.
  5. Fold (red): Fold your hand, granting your opponent the pot.
  6. Call or Check (blue): Call, match the current bet for this action on this street. Check, decline the option to bet.
  7. Bet or Raise (green): Wager the amount in the Input Box.
  8. Input Box (white): Amount to wager. Default 2x the previous bet/raise or 2x the big blind on first preflop action.
No-Limit Texas Hold'Em Rules
